sendAsyncMessage

public <V> Future<V> sendAsyncMessage(Serializable message)
                           throws com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException
Description copied from interface: AsyncServiceManager
This sends an async service request and returns a future that allows the result to be retrieved. The message is sent before the method returns regardless of any active transaction.

Specified by:
sendAsyncMessage in interface AsyncServiceManager
Parameters:
message - The message and handler
Returns:
The Future to retrieve the result later
Throws:
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException

sendAsyncRoutedJob

public <V> Future<V> sendAsyncRoutedJob(String mapName,
                                        Object key,
                                        Job<V> job)
This sends a message to the partition holding the specified key for a Map. This happens immediately independant of any transaction. It's guaranteed to execute once remotely.

Type Parameters:
V -
Parameters:
mapName - The name of the Map for the key
key - The key of the entry
message - The message to send
Returns:

scheduleDurableLocalJob

public void scheduleDurableLocalJob(com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.Session sess,
                                    Job job)
                             throws com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException
Description copied from interface: AsyncServiceManager
This starts a Job within this JVM if the current transaction commits. The job will run on the backup JVM if this one fails before it runs so long as it was 'replicated' over there.

Specified by:
scheduleDurableLocalJob in interface AsyncServiceManager
Parameters:
sess - The transaction to use for scheduling the job
job - The job to run
Throws:
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException
